settings.text_center: Christian Woodjust might be our dream hairdresser. He’s handsome and funny, and his hairstyling skills can make anyone feel more glamorous than they’d previously thought possible. That’s why he’s one of Rosie’s favorite people (glam team or otherwise!) and a go-tocoiffeurfor Sophie Turner, Emily Ratajkowski, Camila Morrone, Lily-Rose Depp, and more. You’ve already viewed his work on countless red carpets and magazine covers, but once you see his wit in action, you’ll realize that his skill is rivaled by his charm. Watch below to see the tools and products he packs in his pro hair kit—emergency chocolate included.

Mason Pearson Popular Mixture Brush, YS Park Round Brush, Kérastase Mousse Bouffante, IGK Good Behavior Smoothing Spray, IGK Speechless Dry Oil Finishing Spray, Kristin Ess Dry Finish Working Texture Spray, Kristin Ess Refine Finishing Spray, Bumble and Bumble Surf Infusion, The Hair Shop, GHD Helios dryer, GHD Platinum+ styler, GHD Curve Soft Curl Iron, Amika High Tide Deep Waver, BaByliss Pro Mini Hair Straightening Iron, Slip Silk Scrunchies, Cadbury Flake

settings.title: HIS RESIDENCY INSPIRATION
settings.text_center: Modern women—in all of their multi-tasking, packed-schedule glory. “Sometimes women don't have all day to do their glam, or they’re rushing out after work and want to feel like they put some effort in,” he says. In these cases, he says, don’t do an elaborate eye look. Instead, go for a statement lip. “It looks intentional and you can take your time without worrying about your hand shaking or putting in individual lashes,” he says.

settings.title: BEHIND THIS LOOK
settings.desc:
As with the other makeup looks in his residency, Sir John created a softly radiant complexion with natural-looking warmth. “When you have a statement color on the lips, staying somewhat monochromatic on the rest of the face works,” he says. To begin, he cleansed and freshened skin with Bioderma Sensibio H2O water. Next, he massaged Marc Jacobs Youthquake moisturizer before applying Marc Jacobs Shameless Foundation in Y360 with a Beautyblender. (L’Oréal Paris Infallible Full Wear Concealer was added where needed.) On cheeks, Huda Beauty Tantour in Light and Fenty Beauty Sun Stalk’r Bronzer in Private Island provided a sun-kissed effect. A dab of Stila Convertible Color in Petunia for blush, plus a dusting of L’Oréal Paris Infallible Loose Setting Powder, and it was time to move on to eyes.

Model Evelyn’s brows were shaped and filled with Baby Hair Pencil in 02, Fro-To-Go Pencil in 06, and Blow Out Brow Gel in 05—all from UOMA Beauty. Since the look focused on lips, Sir John used only L’Oréal Paris Voluminous Lash Paradise mascara on lashes, lending a fresh, mostly unadorned feel to the eyes.

settings.text_center: He defined lips by outlining them with L’Oréal Paris Colour Riche Matte Lip Liner in Strike a Matte-ch, a creamy matte violet. Fenty Beauty Poutsicle Lipstick in Purpsicle bathed lips in an electric purple color, while a generous application of MAC Clear Lipglass created a hyper-glossy effect. “It should be really dense,” he says. “You want full saturation.” So don’t be shy about piling it on—or wearing it out.

settings.quotes: ‘‘ SOMETIMES WOMEN DON'T HAVE ALL DAY TO DO THEIR GLAM  ’’

settings.text_center:
